definition: long-term considerations/to take the long view
to distance oneself from (classical)
far/distant/remote/(intensifier in a comparison) by far/much (lower etc)
to think over/to consider/anxiety
lit. deep plans and distant thoughts/to plan far ahead (idiom)
He who gives no thought to far-flung problems soon finds suffering nearby (idiom, from Analects)./Smug concentration on the here and now will lead to future sorrow.
pinyin: ren2 wu2 yuan3 lu:4 , bi4 you3 jin4 you1

sentences.english: In the end, wisdom and forethought will win.
sentences.chinese: 有了智慧和深谋远虑，最终才会赢得胜利。

sentences.english: He had the foresight to invest his money carefully.
Behind every overextended kid, there is a well-meaning parent.
sentences.chinese: 每个过度开发的孩子背后，总有一个深思远虑的家长。

sentences.english: Believes in the human not to have the foresight to have the sorrow near at hand, guarantees enterprise's vitality.
sentences.chinese: 信奉人无远虑必有近忧，来保证事业的生命力。

sentences.english: If you had had more foresight you would have saved yourself a lot of trouble.
sentences.chinese: 如果你当时深谋远虑你就不会有那么多麻烦了。

sentences.english: Provident men lay aside money for their families.
sentences.chinese: 深谋远虑的人为家庭贮蓄钱财。

sentences.english: The failure is the result of our lack of foresight.
sentences.chinese: 这次失败是由于我们缺乏远虑而造成的。

definition: He who gives no thought to far-flung problems soon finds suffering nearby (idiom, from Analects)./Smug concentration on the here and now will lead to future sorrow.
pinyin: ren2 wu2 yuan3 lu:4 , bi4 you3 jin4 you1

definition: a long-term plan/an ambitious strategy
lit. deep plans and distant thoughts/to plan far ahead (idiom)
forethought
suffering/misery/hardship
to think of danger in times of safety/to be vigilant in peacetime (idiom)
to stand tall and see far (idiom); taking the long and broad view/acute foresight
foresight
good plan/good idea
to plan and consider/to reflect on one's best strategy
vision
(literary) how is one to know?
lit. before it rains, bind around with silk (idiom, from Book of Songs 詩經|诗经); fig. to plan ahead/to prepare for a rainy day
to preserve the accomplishments of previous generations/to carry on the good work of one's predecessors
to thrive in calamity and perish in soft living (idiom)/life springs from sorrow and calamity, death comes from ease and pleasure
pinyin: sheng1 yu2 you1 huan4 , si3 yu2 an1 le4

definition: to be sentimentally attached to sb or sth
